attributes.action: put a stops the suffering caused by toasters with high timer settings and cooking devices which contribute to high percentage of all toast related abuse.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
National Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Toast (NSPCT) 

This is a petition for all of you kind, warm hearted people, who find the abuse against toast heart wrenchingly painful. Please, please sign up and stop the suffering caused by toasters with high timer settings and cooking devices a like.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
